quote1.title: Effect A Scalable Impact
quote1.quote: I am immensely grateful for the opportunity to contribute my skills to a cause that has the power of a scalable impact. The prospect of helping people in numerous places around the world, through innovative technology, fills me with hope and optimism for the future.
quote1.author: Volunteer UX designer

quote2.title: Get Inspired and Inspire Others
quote2.quote: Working with this remarkable team I have come to appreciate the power of collaboration and the magic that happens when individuals from different backgrounds and cultures come together with a common goal to help people to give back to the community.
quote2.author: Volunteer back-end software developer

quote3.title: Develop Skills To Advance Your Career
quote3.quote: This project has taught me a lot of new things that I was previously unaware of, I learned AWS Lambda, EFS, and work in a real Agile Environment. Honestly, the whole experience is amazing. Thank you for believing in me and giving me a chance to be a part of this great team.
quote3.author: Volunteer back-end software developer

quote4.title: Collaborate With Kind People
quote4.quote: I have met so many wonderful, kind-hearted people from different places who share my goals and my belief in this mission. We discuss ideas to improve the platform, we learn from each other, and even help each other on our career paths – all of which gives me a very strong sense of belonging.
quote4.author: Volunteer front-end software developer
